generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings, designed for vehicle traffic, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by bollards and populated with people.
- building: Multiple buildings with distinct architectural styles, including half-timbered facades, are visible along the street and in the background.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are present on the right side of the road and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Numerous individuals are visible walking or standing on the sidewalk and in the background areas.
- car: A dark-colored car is partially visible parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk, including one with a "TAXI" sign.
- traffic sign: A blue circular "TAXI" sign with a red cross is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible in the foreground, near the bottom edge of the image.
